default.label: Bio
content: I'm an experienced and driven software engineering lead devoted to exploring the great outdoors and focused on building and improving processes, products, and teams.

I have a wide array of professional experience ranging from project strategy and planning to coding interactive websites and applications for companies such as Jack in the Box, Nickelodeon, Lowe's, and more.

snarky.label: Words that kinda describe me
content: Why use Claude Sonnet to write your bio when you can just rage code for 14 hours and write whatever your comes to mind?

So, I write code. I review code. I make pitch decks. I sit on decks. I walk into forests and contemplate why I code for a living and how I can survive off berries and tree bark. I realize I have a family to feed and rent to pay and then code more. Please read this and think I'm witty and charming.
